trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The tasloi can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Javelin Expert
entries: Tasloi can use their Dexterity score for attack and damage rolls with a javelin, just as if the javelin had the finesse property.

action.name: Blowgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 25/100 ft., one target. {@h}5 (1 + 4) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 9} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for one hour.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.
